city of location: City of the location, e.g. Frankfurt am Main
enable download of daily forecast: Activate download of the daily forecast (up to 5 days)
enable download of hourly forecast: Enable hourly forecast download (up to 24 hours).
maximim parse timeout before no response: Maximum parse timeout in seconds before reporting a response error
no_icons_found: No symbols were found in the selected path
optional: bundesland/state for descripti: optional: federal state for search filters (e.g. Saxony-Anhalt, Saxony, Baden-Württemberg, Bavaria, Thuringia, Brandenburg)
parse interval in [min]: Parse interval in minutes, time between data requests
postcode of location: Postal code of the place, e.g. 60313 for Frankfurt am Main
